title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research and gather input from stakeholders to understand their needs and expectations.

title: Design and Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the core components, data flow, and integration points. Define the technical specifications, standards, and best practices for maintainability, scalability, and performance. Consider edge cases, error handling, and security aspects.

title: Code Analysis and Parsing
description: Develop the core functionality to analyze and parse various programming languages and codebases. Implement algorithms for code comprehension and extraction of relevant information.

title: Documentation Generation
description: Implement the logic to generate comprehensive documentation, including API references, architecture diagrams, and usage examples, based on the analyzed codebase.

title: User Interface and Visualization
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the documentation generator, including visualization tools for exploring the generated documentation.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test suites to ensure the correctness and reliability of the documentation generator. Implement automated testing frameworks and continuous integration pipelines.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment pipelines for the documentation generator. Implement monitoring, logging, and scaling strategies.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the documentation generator adheres to security best practices and industry standards. Implement access controls, data encryption, and auditing mechanisms.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive user guides, tutorials, and documentation for the documentation generator, covering installation, configuration, and usage scenarios.
